text:
rain in seattle,
umbrellas are forgotten,
drenched in memories

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snowflakes gently fall,
mountains whisper winter's call,
one more run, we glide

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat
